component_locations.Efficiency: to the right of the RevenueFlow component
component_locations.ListTab: below the RevenueFlow and Efficiency Component
component_locations.Filter: to the right of the Search component
component_locations.Wallet: to the right of the Efficiency
component_locations.TeamChat: to the bottom of the Wallet component

functionality.sidebar_toggle: a toggle feature that allows the sidebar to be collapse and expand
functionality.table_pagination: a feature that allows the table to be paginated
functionality.table_filtering: a feature that allows the table to be filtered based on month
